product_name: NOCO XGrid 4W Foldable USB Solar Panel Kit
long_description: Turn up campfire tunes or power essential devices when you plug into this portable solar kit. The compact design charges quickly by sunlight or USB and folds neatly to pack for off-grid energy.
short_description: Turn up campfire tunes or power essential devices when you plug into this portable solar kit. The compact design charges quickly by sunlight or USB and folds neatly to pack for off-grid energy.
